Elsa.description: Elsa is John's neighbor. She is a very nice person and she is always willing to help John. She is a very good friend of John. He likes her but doesn't like to lose while playing chess.

James.description: James is John's neighbor. John doesn't like him very much because he is always asking for help.

Tom.description: Tom is John's roommate and colleague at Orange. They have a strong bond and support each other in both personal and professional matters. John appreciates Tom's cooking skills and gaming companionship.

Sara.description: Sara is John's friend and the sister of Alice. They have a good relationship, but John sometimes finds Sara's environmental activism a bit overwhelming. Nonetheless, he respects her passion.

Alice.description: Alice is John's friend and the sister of Sara. They share common interests in technology and gaming, which strengthens their bond. John appreciates Alice's intelligence and creativity.
